programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse With Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Bloomberg Open Interest with Matt Miller and Dani Burger - delivers the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: A weekly show on fixed income with the biggest names in the field, covering sovereign and credit markets as investors grapple with fiscal, monetary and financial factors.

programme.title: Bloomberg Next Africa
programme.desc: A monthly deep dive into Africa's biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens, discussing key steps taken to help deliver on Africa's quest of bridging the gap with global powers.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld break down the day's top market-moving stories and trading action around the closing bell.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: A weekly program telling the stories of capitalism from around the world, hosted by David Westin in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg Next Africa
programme.desc: A monthly deep dive into Africa's biggest stories through a Bloomberg lens, discussing key steps taken to help deliver on Africa's quest of bridging the gap with global powers.

programme.title: Bloomberg Power Players
programme.desc: Bloomberg Power Players in New York brings together influential voices from the business of sports to identify the next wave of disruption that could hit this multi-trillion dollar global industry.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex. Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, opens up in a wide-ranging interview about life beyond the royal spotlight and her latest ventures in business and entertainment.

programme.title: America's Wild Spaces
programme.desc: Journey with JT Reynolds, Death Valley's larger-than-life superintendent, and meet the scientists who are working to protect this wild place as the mercury rises.

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: Life is risky, and no stage of life is riskier than the very beginning. Most animals are born frail, vulnerable, and with a lot of learning to do. But life doesn't go easy on the newcomers..

programme.title: Trials Of The Wild
programme.desc: When you've got it all, why would you give it all up? We expect animals to take the path of least resistance -- choosing the easiest and surest ways to get food, safety and comfort. But animals aren't always so predictable.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: From a muskrat attack to a cat missing an eye, the clinic is full of surprises. Dr. Pol rushes to an Amish farm to help a cow thats been in labor for 24 hours, and Dr. Nicole treats her dogs injured leg. Dr. Brenda gives step-by-step care instructions to a family new to raising Scottish Highland cows, and Dr. Lisa does a dental exam on Elvis the donkey. Dr. Nicole shares exciting news! .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Spring brings a baby boom of goats, reindeer, and Labrador pups. When a chicken is the victim of fowl play, Dr. Pols on the case. Dr. Brenda treats a fair steer to be ready for the ring and Dr. Lisa sutures a horses torn eyelid. An older cats labor stalled, so Dr. Nicole performs an emergency C-section to save the kittens. Charles and Diane surprise the docs on Vet Appreciation Day.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds assembles ‚ÄúThe Superzeros,‚Äù a team of somewhat pitiful animals with unexpectedly awesome superpowers. Forget about the cheetah‚Äôs speed and the eagle‚Äôs eyesight; and say hello to the invisible glass frog, the indestructible honey badger and the might of the pistol shrimp who can fire bubbles hotter than the sun.

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Ryan shares his distinct take on the underdogs using gross-out tactics to win the game of life. With manatees using flatulence to control their buoyancy to cave-dwelling fungus gnats creating beautifully illuminated flytraps with mucus from their butts, these underdogs are out to prove who may be the grossest survivor of them all.
